"you can't have white pride without saying that other people are less than 
you are...?" really?! last time I checked, that question would never be 
presented to a Black Panther...or hell for that matter, any black, asian, 
or hispanic that says they have pride in their race. So why is it 
automatically racist & bad for a white person to say they have white pride, 
but perfectly acceptable for any other race to say "black pride" "mexican 
pride" & stuff like that? seems to be a different set of standards for 
white people when it comes to racism & there's a HUGE misconception that 
"only white people can be racist" & that is complete bullshit. Racism is in 
every country in the world & comes in many different colors. Many asians 
are racist, many black people are racist, many hispanics are racist, & yes 
many white people are racist. But it seems that all anybody ever thinks 
about or talks about is white people being racist. Which, guess what, 
doesn't solve shit. Until every single person on this planet, regardless of 
race or color, can get past the fact that not everybody out there is just 
like them, then there will always be racism. & as long as people refuse to 
acknowledge anything but white racism, those people are actually making the 
problem worse. That's my rant about the white pride comment. Now the 
compensating for a little penis comment. The belief in the second 
amendment, which for people that don't know says "A well regulated militia, 
being necessary to the security of a free state, the right of the people to 
keep and bear arms, shall not be infringed." SHALL NOT BE INFRINGED! That 
means that the founding fathers of this great country held a firm belief in 
the FACT that guns make people safer. Don't believe me? Police have guns, 
commonly held belief in this country is that they make us safer, right? 
Still not buying that guns make us safer? Look no further than the major 
cities that have strict gun control, where most common law abiding citizens 
are restricted &/or forbidden from owning guns. Detroit, Chicago, New York. 
What do those 3 cities have in common? 3 of the highest murder rates & 
overall crime rates in the country. The people that are so obsessed with 
fighting gun control laws, that in this pathetic excuse of a news report 
references as having tiny penises, are actually the people that still know 
& understand & believe the same thing that our founding fathers did, guns 
are not only important, but necessary. So, before people like Thom Hartmann 
start talking, try educating yourself first. & no Mr. Hartmann I don't care 
where, or if, you have a degree. I mean actually do some journalism & try 
digging deeper into the subjects you choose to discuss. & if anybody has 
cared to make it this far into my post, they're probably foaming at the 
mouth to throw the race card at me & call me a lot of stupid names, rather 
than combat my argument with facts of their own. But I'm about to silence 
those people, & at the same time, piss off others. the KKK is ridiculous. 
the 1 thing that Thom gets right is when he says it's more of a "clown 
show" these days. There shouldn't be a need for groups like that, or the 
Black Panthers, or any other racially motivated organizations in todays 
world. In this country, we are all Americans. Not white americans, not 
african american, not asian american, not latin american. Just American.﻿
